title: Calories in Poppy Seeds
meta_description: Discover calories in poppy seed per tablespoon serving, including carbs, protein, fat, fiber, and nutrition tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Dry, whole poppy seeds; standard serving 1 tablespoon (approx. 9g); unsalted, untoasted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, processing, moisture content, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of poppy seeds provides ~46 kcal, with 2 g fiber and 1.6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Lightly toasted (enhances flavor, minor calorie increase)
Hulled poppy seeds (lower fiber, slightly fewer calories)
Mixed with 1 tsp honey (for sweet topping)

faqs.q: How many calories in one tablespoon of poppy seeds?
Are poppy seeds high in fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 tbsp provides ~2.1 g dietary fiber.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in poppy seeds?
faqs.a: Around 4 g total fat per tablespoon, mostly unsaturated.
Yes, approximately 1.6 g protein per tablespoon.

faqs.q: Calories in 100 g of poppy seeds?
faqs.a: Roughly 525 kcal per 100 g, scaling from the basis.
